articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam meets Lao party and state delegation and guests of Germany 
    Pyongyang, October 16 (KCNA) -- Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly who is chairman of the Korean Social Scientists Society, met and conversed with director general Vishwanath, honorary director general Shuhachi Inoue and secretary general Kenichi Ogami of the International Institute of the Juche Idea, on a visit to Korea at the Mansudae Assembly Hall today.

articles.content:
Books praising Kim Jong Il published in Syria 
   Pyongyang, October 16 (KCNA) -- The Dar Dimashk Publishing House of Syria published books praising the greatness of General Secretary Kim Jong Il including "Kim Jong Il, Benevolent Politics" and "Fortune of Korea" on October 7 to mark the 55th anniversary of the Worker's Party of Korea.
